description: This file sets up a knowledge base from a PDF URL, initializes an agent with an IBM WatsonX model, and prompts the agent to answer a question about Thai curry.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with a knowledge base and a language model.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that loads content from a PDF URL.

classes.name: WatsonX
classes.description: A class representing the IBM WatsonX language model.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A vector database interface using PostgreSQL with pgvector.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating it.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Prints the agent's response to a given prompt, optionally in markdown.
